overview.purpose: Define options strategies for each archetype in the idiosyncratic trading framework
overview.integration: Used by analyze and score skills to recommend options vs equity
overview.philosophy: Options provide leverage and defined risk for binary catalysts with known timelines

pdufa.rationale: Binary catalyst with defined date - perfect for options. 92% approval rate justifies directional bet.

recommended_strategies.name: long_calls
recommended_strategies.description: Buy ATM or 1 strike OTM calls expiring after PDUFA date
recommended_strategies.use_case: Primary strategy - simple directional bet on approval

recommended_strategies.name: call_debit_spread
recommended_strategies.description: Buy ATM call, sell OTM call to reduce cost
recommended_strategies.use_case: When IV is high or want to reduce premium outlay

expiration_rules.rule: First monthly expiration AFTER PDUFA date + 7 days minimum

position_sizing.note: Same 1.5% risk as equity, but 3-5x notional exposure

pdufa.entry_timing: Immediately after watchlist creation and BUY/CONDITIONAL score

exit_rules.note: Exit at 1.5 weighted sum (vs 2.0 for equity) due to theta decay

activist.rationale: Long timeline (3-12 months) suits LEAPS. Tier-1 83% success rate justifies leverage.

tier_restrictions.tier_3: Equity only - insufficient conviction for leverage

recommended_strategies.name: leaps_calls
recommended_strategies.use_case: Tier-1 activists only - high conviction campaigns

expiration_rules.rationale: Campaigns take 3-12 months, need time decay buffer

strike_selection.note: Activists typically drive 15-30% gains, don't need deep OTM strikes

merger_arb.rationale: Use options only for wide spreads (>8%) to justify complexity

recommended_strategies.name: long_calls_target
recommended_strategies.description: Buy calls on target at current price, capture spread compression

recommended_strategies.name: risk_reversal
recommended_strategies.description: Short puts at current price, long calls at deal price
recommended_strategies.use_case: High conviction deals, reduce net cost

expiration_rules.rule: Expiration 1-2 months AFTER expected deal close

strike_selection.long_calls: Strike at current target price or 1 strike below
strike_selection.target_price: Deal price (may not have exact strike, use closest)

position_sizing.note: Smaller than equity (3%) due to added complexity

merger_arb.entry_timing: After kill screens pass and spread confirmed >8%

exit_rules.deal_break_risk: Cockroach rule applies - exit on first wobble

insider.rationale: Use selectively for high-conviction clusters only (higher bar than equity)

recommended_strategies.name: long_calls_6_12mo
recommended_strategies.description: 6-12 month calls on volume surge signal
recommended_strategies.use_case: High conviction insider clusters with volume confirmation

expiration_rules.rationale: Wait for volume surge signal (up to 90 days), need time buffer

strike_selection.note: Insider clusters suggest 20-40% upside, ATM captures this

position_sizing.note: Smaller than equity (5%) due to lower base rate (65-70%)

insider.entry_timing: Wait for volume surge >2x average (framework rule), then enter options

exit_rules.volume_signal_fails: If no volume surge within 90 days, close position
exit_rules.target_hit: Exit 50% on 25% gain, let rest run

spinoff.rationale: Options market typically doesn't exist until 60-90 days post-spin
issues: Newly listed companies have no options for 30-90 days
Framework requires entry days 30-60 (forced selling period)
When options finally available, forced selling window has passed
Low liquidity and wide spreads even after listing
spinoff.recommendation: Use equity only for this archetype

liquidation.rationale: SPACs near NAV have minimal volatility - options offer no advantage
issues: SPACs trading $9.80-$10.20 have minimal implied volatility
Options premiums often exceed potential gain ($0.20-$0.40 upside)
Better to use equity and capture discount compression directly
Options market illiquid on most SPACs
liquidation.recommendation: Use equity only for this archetype

legislative.rationale: Uncertain timelines and theta decay make options unsuitable
issues: Bills can stall, delay, or fail - no defined catalyst date
Secondary beneficiaries (preferred targets) often lack liquid options
Time decay works against position on uncertain timelines
Entry is 3-6 months pre-passage but timing unpredictable
legislative.recommendation: Use equity only for this archetype

strategy_selection_logic.step_2: Verify idea meets enhanced thresholds (if applicable)
strategy_selection_logic.step_4: Compare breakeven analysis: stock move needed vs premium cost
strategy_selection_logic.step_5: If options pass all checks AND offer better risk/reward, recommend options
strategy_selection_logic.note: analyze skill should present BOTH options and equity as alternatives with pros/cons

breakeven_analysis_template.comparison: If stock_move_needed < mispricing_gap AND leverage > 3x, options favorable

notes: Options are TOOLS, not replacements - use when they offer clear advantage
Theta decay is the enemy - only use when catalyst timeline is DEFINED
Liquidity is critical - wide spreads eliminate edge
Start with PDUFA and Tier-1 Activist - these have highest success probability
Track options performance separately to validate strategy over time
